param.name: type
param.label: Type
param.description: Select the hidden item type. This determines what exactly is hidden.

param.name: item
param.label: Item
param.description: Input the hidden item id. For activity supply the activity id. For comment supply the comment id. For asset supply the full asset to hide. For user supply the user id to hide.

param.name: user_id
param.label: Owner
param.description: Input owner as single integer user_id.
